briefTitle: Long-term Safety Study of Glycopyrronium in Subjects With Primary Axillary Hyperhidrosis
officialTitle: An Open-label Study Assessing Long-term Safety of Glycopyrronium in Subjects With Primary Axillary Hyperhidrosis
summary: This is an open-label, long-term safety study of glycopyrronium topical wipes, enrolling up to 660 subjects with primary axillary hyperhidrosis who participated in either the DRM04-HH04 or DRM04-HH05 studies.

primaryOutcome.measure: Long-term Safety Assessed Through Adverse Events and Local Skin Reactions
